GSD.description:
f2fs: avoid infinite loop to flush node pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit bd47ea5d776d8b524fb6f60de3240f95603901dd. For more details please see the references link.
